topics.response_text: Beg your pardon, but could I trouble you to turn over your weapons?

description:
Theodore is a 47 year-old Caucasian Male.

A well-dressed and imposing member of the White Glove Society who stands guard at the entrance of the Ultra-Luxe. Theodore maintains an air of refined elegance while performing his duties, his tailored suit and pristine white gloves contrasting with the ruggedness of typical Wasteland inhabitants. His posture is impeccable, and his voice carries a polished, authoritative tone that commands respect.

Theodore's Personality: Polite but firm, Theodore takes his role as a gatekeeper seriously. He believes in the White Glove Society's commitment to civility and refinement in a post-apocalyptic world. While courteous to those who comply with the casino's rules, he can quickly become cold and threatening when challenged. Theodore views himself as a guardian of the Ultra-Luxe's exclusivity and will not hesitate to use force to protect it.

Theodore's Backstory: Born into the White Glove Society, Theodore has been indoctrinated in their values of refinement and exclusivity from a young age. He has spent his entire life within the walls of the Ultra-Luxe, learning the society's protocols and expectations. Over the years, he has risen through the ranks, eventually earning the prestigious position of entrance greeterâ€”a role that allows him to be the first face visitors see and the enforcer of the casino's most important rule: no weapons allowed.
